name: Haven Village
description: A small village nestled in a valley, known for its skilled craftspeople and peaceful atmosphere. The village served as a refuge during the Dragon War.

connectedLocations.description: An old mine in the mountains to the north, rumored to contain precious metals and strange creatures.
A winding path through the dense forest to the east.

parentLocation.description: Haven Village is part of the Eastern Realm, a territory recovering from the Dragon War.

subLocations.description: Master Smith's forge, hot and bustling with activity even without his prized hammer.
A small market square where locals trade goods and share gossip.

pointsOfInterest.name: Ancient Oak
pointsOfInterest.description: A massive oak tree at the center of the village, said to be older than the realm itself.

pointsOfInterest.name: Mysterious Footprints
pointsOfInterest.description: Small, unusual footprints near the smithy that lead toward the forest path.

historyLog.description: The player arrived in Haven Village and explored the main square.
The player met Master Smith, who was visibly frustrated.

notes: Haven Village is known for its exceptional metalwork and has a legend about friendly forest spirits who sometimes borrow tools.
